Gutek Application Overview

Gutek is a Java-based application designed to support intelligent learning through customizable revision algorithms. The application integrates Spring Boot for backend management and JavaFX for the graphical user interface, allowing users to manage language learning, spaced repetition, and memory retention processes.

Main Components

  • gutek: The main package, containing the entry point for the application in the Main class.
  • gutek.gui: Contains all graphical user interface components, organized in sub-packages for charts, controllers, and custom controls.
  • gutek.services: Provides business logic and service classes, including translation and revision algorithm management.
  • gutek.entities: Contains JPA entities representing key data models, such as cards, decks, and users.
  • gutek.repositories: Spring Data JPA repositories for managing persistence of entities.
  • gutek.utils: Utility classes that provide common functionality, including validation, alert management, and FXML loading.
  • gutek.config: Configuration classes for setting up Spring beans and application properties.

Features

  • Intelligent revision algorithms with support for bidirectional learning
  • Customizable and extensible framework for adding new algorithms and views
  • Automated database management with Spring Data JPA
  • Statistics and analytics to track learning progress

Getting Started

To run the application, start by initializing the Spring Boot context in the Main class. This will set up the JavaFX interface and display the main stage for interacting with learning tools and settings.

Packages
Package
Description
gutek
Main package of the application.
gutek.config
This package contains configuration classes used throughout the application, primarily for configuring Spring beans.
gutek.entities
This package contains JPA entities used across the application, organized into the following sub-packages: algorithms - Entities for revision algorithms. cards - Entities representing cards used within the application. decks - Entities representing decks, which organize and group cards. languages - Entities for managing locale settings and application language preferences. users - Entities for application users.
gutek.entities.algorithms
This package contains revision algorithms used in the application.
gutek.entities.cards
This package contains entity classes representing cards used in the application.
gutek.entities.decks
This package contains entity classes representing decks in the application.
gutek.entities.languages
This package contains entity classes representing language settings in the application.
gutek.entities.users
This package contains entity classes representing users in the application.
gutek.gui
This package contains the main graphical user interface (GUI) components, organized into several sub-packages: charts - Classes for creating and managing charts used in the application. controllers - Controllers for handling various JavaFX controls, including: Controllers for ListView JavaFX controls. Controllers for managing decks. Controllers used during application initialization. Main view controllers. Controllers for menu components: the main menu bar and deck management menus. A primary class for storing the main Stage and loading specific Scenes. controls - JavaFX controls used across the application.
gutek.gui.charts
This package contains classes representing various charts used in the application.
gutek.gui.controllers
This package contains all JavaFX controllers used in the application.
gutek.gui.controllers.controls
This package contains controllers for managing custom controls related to ListView cells within the application.
gutek.gui.controllers.deck
This package contains controllers for managing and handling decks within the application.
gutek.gui.controllers.launch
This package contains controllers responsible for handling the application's launch and initialization processes.
gutek.gui.controllers.main
This package contains the main controllers for the primary views of the application.
gutek.gui.controllers.menu
This package contains controllers for the menus used in the application.
gutek.gui.controls
This package contains additional custom controls used for displaying various elements of the application.
gutek.repositories
This package contains Spring Data JPA repositories, including: Application user repository. App Locale settings repository. Card repository. Repository for managing card revision registration. Deck repository. Deck statistics repository. Revision algorithms repository.
gutek.services
This package contains all service classes used in the application, including: User management services for the application. Card management services. Services for managing card revision registration. Deck management services. Deck statistics services. Repetition algorithm management services. Chart management services. Translation services.
gutek.utils
This package contains essential utility classes used throughout the project: Classes for field validation for specific objects. A class for handling Alert windows. A class for loading FXML views. A class for managing image and icon loading. The SpringContext class for retrieving beans from the Spring context. Utilities for String manipulation.
gutek.utils.validation
This package contains classes and annotations for validating field values of objects.
